title: Cloud-Based Collaborative Language Learning Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and elementary English teaching experience
context.additional_context: A collaborative process where practicing elementary English educators develop and share language teaching content using cloud platforms primarily via smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can create three or more English educational contents utilizing free cloud tools such as Google Drive/Padlet
Learners can iteratively improve content by exchanging feedback with peers in real-time at least five times through cloud-based collaboration tools
Learners can upload their created content to the corporate internal knowledge management system and share it with colleagues more than 10 times.

resources: Free cloud platforms (e.g., Google Workspace, Padlet)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
